scripts.say: I've been waiting for you. I am Illustrious, the Illustrious-class armoured aircraft carrier.
Tell me this, Illustrious: how did the Royal Navy deduce that we would transfer our battleships over to Taranto harbor?
It was quite easy, really... If we were in your position, we would have done the same thing.
Now you've said it... Are you also the one responsible for this bombing?
Correct. Those Swordfish squadrons are all my prided children.
What a magnificent woman. If you were Sardegnian, I might have fallen for you.
But after what you've done, I'm afraid I have to destroy you.
Remember this name - I am Littorio, Veneto-class battleship of the Sardegna Empire! En garde, signora!
